mapper.insert: insert into videolist(num, video_num, add_id, video_title, video_id, channel_url, adddate, image, add_nickname) values (#{num}, video_seq.nextval, #{add_id}, #{video_title}, #{video_id}, #{channel_url}, sysdate, #{image}, #{add_nickname})
mapper.select: select * from videolist where (num=#{num}) order by adddate
select video_id from videolist where (num=#{num}) order by adddate
